ISSUE.TITLE: Fix importance levels for configs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Some of the importance levels for the configs aren't set right. For example, the mediatype is set to high, but should really be low since users generally shouldn't set this value -- it was set to high in rest-utils because any rest-utils application _should_ override it with a value specific for that application. The rest of the settings could also use review (and some in rest-utils may need updates as well).

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Trivial config fix: default value for schema.registry.connect must be a URL.
